data_details.label: Working memory
data_details.docstring: All the facts in the working memory of current step

data_details.label: Fired rules from start
data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Goals/Subgoals
data_details.docstring: Goal and subgoals (with their respective rule) until this step. Achieved subgoals should be removed

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data: Rule 1 is fired and K is added into the working memory.
Rule 7 is fired because K and Q is present in the working memory and W is true. W will be added into the working memory.
G is present in the working memory. Rule 10 is fired and R is pass into the working memory.
Rule 4 will be fired as Q and R are present in the working memory and H is added into the working memory.
Rule 3 is fired as W and H is in the working memory and C is added into the working memory.
There are no more rules to be fired and C is the final decision.
